verses.roman:
kṛṣṇera ujjvala-rasa--mṛgamada-bhara
sei mṛgamade vicitrita kalevara

synonyms: kṛṣṇera—of Lord Kṛṣṇa; ujjvala-rasa—the conjugal mellow; mṛga-mada—of musk; bhara—an abundance; sei—that; mṛga-made—made by the aroma of the musk; vicitrita—decorated; kalevara—Her whole body.
translation: "Conjugal love for Kṛṣṇa is just like an abundance of musk. By that musk, Her whole body is decorated.
